import React from 'react' import {useContext} from 'react' import {jwtDecode as jwt_decode} from 'jwt-decode' import AuthContext from '../context/AuthContext' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' function Navbar() { const {user, logoutUser} = useContext(AuthContext) const token = localStorage.getItem("authTokens") if (token){ const decoded = jwt_decode(token) var user_id = decoded.user_id } return (
